title: What Does the 🌹 Rose Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The rose emoji represents love.
steps.content: The rose emoji represents love. Roses are symbols of beauty and romance, and the 🌹 emoji is no different. If you get a 🌹 from a guy or girl you like, chances are they like you too! But this emoji doesn’t just show romantic love, it can also be used platonically. Because of this, the 🌹 is a popular emoji to use on both Valentine’s Day and Mother’s Day. “I couldn’t have asked for a sweeter Valentine 🌹😘” “Sending you all the roses in the world on this special day! I love you🌹”

steps.title: Above all else, the rose emoji is a flower.
steps.content: Above all else, the rose emoji is a flower. This beautiful blossom can be used to express a love for all things floral or a simple declaration that spring is near. [1] X Research source “Did you see the rose gardens? Breathtaking! 🌹” “There’s something so magical about spring 🌹🌼🌷”

steps.title: A rose emoji shows support for Democratic Socialists.
steps.content: A rose emoji shows support for Democratic Socialists. Twitter users may surround their usernames with roses for political reasons. This delicate but strong emoji is the symbol for Democratic Socialists, representing the group’s call for gender and racial equality. If you see a single 🌹 in someone’s bio, it may be because they’re a Democratic Socialist. [2] X Research source “Jenna 🌹 BTS🖤 Capricorn ♑ ” “Wanna go to that socialist talk tomorrow? 🌹”

steps.title: When you’re feeling romantic:
steps.content: When you’re feeling romantic: Attach a 🌹 to the end of a love poem or adoring compliment to show just how much you love someone. You can use this romantic emoji on Valentine’s Day or any day you want to shower them with love. [3] X Research source “Roses are red, violets are blue, and I am so lucky to have you 🌹💙” “You are the most beautiful flower in all the garden 🌹”

steps.title: When it’s Mother’s Day:
steps.content: When it’s Mother’s Day: Tell your mom you love her with a 🌹. You may have sent her flowers IRL, but a digital bouquet never hurts! Pair this emoji with other flowers like 🌼, 🌷, and 🌸 to make a personalized arrangement that says, “You’re the best mom ever.” “Happy Mother’s Day, mom! I love you to the moon and back! 🌹💖” “You’re the best mom ever 🌹🌼🌷🌸”

steps.title: When you love flowers:
steps.content: When you love flowers: If you adore roses, use the 🌹 whenever it feels right! Decorate your message or bio with your favorite flower so show off your personality. “I have to say, roses are my favorite 🌹” “🌹🌻🌷 Abigail 🌷🌻🌹”

steps.title: When you’re making a political stand:
steps.content: When you’re making a political stand: Show the world you’re a Democratic Socialist by adding a 🌹 to your username. This is a subtle way to show your allegiance and solidarity for the group’s causes. You can also put this emoji after a political message to emphasize your political stance. “John Doe 🌹⚽” “Ready to stand up for what I believe in 🌹”

steps.title: The 🥀 shows the beautiful 🌹 after it's withered.
steps.content: The 🥀 shows the beautiful 🌹 after it's withered. This variation of the popular 🌹 emoji expresses feelings of heartbreak, depression, and sadness. Basically, it’s the opposite of the hopeful and romanticized 🌹. Use the 🥀 alongside a 💔 to convey intense heartache. [4] X Research source “I’m never going to fall in love again 🥀💔😭” “Those you love the most end up hurting you the most 🥀💔”
